source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT Company_Name
      ,Company_Number
      ,Reg_Address_Care_Of
      ,Reg_Address_PO_Box
      ,Address_Line_1
      ,Address_Line_2
      ,Town
      ,County
      ,Country
      ,Postcode
      ,Company_Category
      ,Company_Status
      ,Country_of_Origin
    ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(200),Dissolution_Date,104 ) AS Dissolution_Date
    ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(200), Incorporation_Date,104) AS Incorporation_Date     
      ,Account_Refday
      ,Account_Refmonth
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Accounts_NextDueDate,104 )  AS Accounts_NextDueDate
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Accounts_LastMadeupDate,104 ) Accounts_LastMadeupDate
      ,Acoounts_Category
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Returns_NextDueDate,104 )  AS Returns_NextDueDate
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Returns_LastMadeUpDate,104 )  AS Returns_LastMadeUpDate
      ,Mortgage_Charges
      ,Mortgage_Outstanding
      ,Mortgage_Part_Satisifed
      ,SICCode_SicText_1
      ,SICCode_SicText_2
      ,SICCode_SicText_3
      ,SICCode_SicText_4
      ,LimitedPartnerships_NumGenPartners
      ,LimitedPartnerships_NumLimPartners
      ,URI AS URL
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_1_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_1_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_1_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_2_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_2_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_2_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_3_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_3_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_3_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_4_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_4_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_4_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_5_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_5_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_5_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_6_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_6_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_6_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_7_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_7_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_7_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_8_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_8_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_8_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_9_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_9_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_9_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),PreviousName_10_CONDATE,104 )  AS PreviousName_10_CONDATE
      ,PreviousName_10_CompanyName
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(max),ConfStmtNextDueDate,104 ) AS ConfStmtNextDueDate
      ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(max),ConfStmtLastMadeUpDate,104 ) AS ConfStmtLastMadeUpDate
  FROM KNE_STG.Company_House
